channel.title: Beta
channel.description: Forum will be back up soon for players to create accounts.

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @malikz malikz
item.description:
@malikz wrote:

I had a similar problem, wearing rune plate and legs (99 def), while the guy was in monk robes (99 def)…I had a r2h on and he had a d long. Long story short, he won the fight (both of us were flats)

I feel like on this server def is useless. I have 80 def and addy armor and just got destroyed by someone with no armor at all. Those of us willing to take armor into the wildy should actually benefit by it.

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @malikz malikz
item.description:
@malikz wrote:

Servers back up, seems like an upgrade to me. I haven’t been able to pk yet, but it seems legit.

EDIT: After playing for a few days, I can honestly say this server is good for pking. Forget the rest, if you want to spend your days having fun and not grinding 24.7, come join!

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @Everyonedies Everyonedies
item.description:
@Everyonedies wrote:

It might actually be fun if I did help the staff of Just PK. I don’t care for the game any more but I do love knocking inflated egos down to size. I’ve already added a date into my calender in case NYE fucks me up so bad I forget about the karma train.

Pssst, I see children on minecraft, Must be the place you feel most comfortable to socialize in and around those you have most in common with. Pastebin much more?

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @Raiden2 Raiden.
item.description:
@Raiden2 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:54, topic:546475”]I support this server and it’s administrators. I just want to play but they ban people for registering I guess… So if you ban people you don’t like but you show constant hate towards this community which is why you’re advertising here?

I don’t play minecraft I just like little face.[/quote]

You aren’t welcome, you proved you were affiliated with Hixk so we do not want you as part of our community. Oh btw, proxied IP’s will be prohibited from registrations soon enough. Thanks for the reminder.

Now why don’t you run along and find something constructive to do with your life? Same goes for anyone else who feels the need to try and rock the boat. JustPK will remain a free to play game for the people who still have genuine love for the game & rsc pking.

As for your “support”, you can shove that where the sun doesn’t shine pal.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I support this server and it’s administrators. I just want to play but they ban people for registering I guess… So if you ban people you don’t like but you show constant hate towards this community which is why you’re advertising here?

I don’t play minecraft I just like little face.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @Everyonedies Everyonedies
item.description:
@Everyonedies wrote:

Well, I dont have time to play but I will support your security. RSC has always been a hate jealous filled section. I’ve known smoke for 14 years and hes a great guy to have running things. He did great on Rscheatnet.com and both my rs2cheating.com/us I helped run. Funniest thing is I know from a couple of my friends who played JustPK who bug abused, Shame they wish to come to a forum as if they’ve done nothing. Well, As in life there is always bigger fish in the sea. Some of us work within a field little skiddys try to fight in… Shame really… Ruins the idea of the game to have such muppets about… Cheating and getting cought only to try spin the blame off. Typical nolife childish acts.

I wonder how they would react if it happend to them. Run a free game for people who think its funny to mess with it. What goes around comes around is a phrase ive always liked.

Why people need to cause trouble is beyond me… Dont agree with how other people do what they are doing? Just shut your faggot mouths. What other people do doesnt effect you, its nothing to do with you. It dont effect your day to day existence so why get involved? Just proves a point that your really are no life faggots with nothing better to do than try cause bullshit… Dickheads always get shot down, by someone or other… Just stfu move on with your lives and stop thinking you have the right to try sabotage people… Because your the very same morons who when it happens back to you… Run to forums and QQ more.

Minecraft, Lol. Says it all.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I was banned from your forum but then I made another account, you mad?

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @Raiden2 Raiden.
item.description:
@Raiden2 wrote:

My issue lies with the trolls on here. I suggest you re-read the previous posts. Here, let me shorten it for you…

Hixk admitted to ddosing, then he got into our forum. We do not take this type of attack lightly and will respond as we see fit. Your nor anyone else’s opinion matters on this issue.

Thanks for those links to whatever guides they may be, they aren’t needed though. As Everyonedies stated… real life does come first. We don’t all sit hitting the refresh button on mopar waiting for a new post to pop up so we can troll it.

JustPK will be back soon and any non trolls are more than welcome. Ignore the idiots on here with no social life and nothing better to do with their time than talk utter garbage.

Huge re-launch coming within the next few days, stay tuned.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @Everyonedies Everyonedies
item.description:
@Everyonedies wrote:

I agree with Hyper(Pisoff?), to a certain extent. No one gives a shit about this forum any more. Although, Some people have other things to do than rush out servers, Like socializing and jobs. People play rsce for the player count and most people dont care for cross server bullshit and just want to play the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“Raiden., post:48, topic:546475”][quote author=da real hype link=topic=665373.msg4453395#msg4453395 date=1413132649]

Like I said, Hixk made the first move, he shouldn’t have started a fight with us if he didn’t want a response. As for running crying to Rodgerwilco, I guess there’s always one runt who needs a cuddle when they get a little upset, #Cute.

@Wilco, there were 3x NPC’s who dropped crackers, 1 who dropped it every time. Sounds to me like your kinda friends are the ones who expect to be spoon fed…

For the last time, Mopar is irrelevant to us. We built a rapport with the players we want to play along side of which goes beyond this shitty community that roam around posts aimlessly causing shit. Or in Rodgerwilco’s case, setting up partnerships with Known hackers and ddosers. Couldn’t care less about being the server with the most players. All irrelevant nonsense to us, as we have all the players we need on standby.

Thanks for stopping by, see you on the other side.

if u think that mopar forums are irrelevant than why keep responding to a post here? If you don’t care about advertising, what will you do to keep your game from dying?

Mopar is the biggest rsc community, other forums you will get very few people if any and by saying mopar is irrelevant makes me think your a young twat who puts up a server just for recognition and nothing else. This is why rsc is dying, people like you who put up a server, bash the community and then take it down. Trust is a big part in running a server yet the more you talk, the more you show who you really are.

you’re not gonna win against trolls yet you keep trying.
[/quote]

I have nothing to prove, mopar is shit most of the people here are downy twats like you. I’ll still throw an advert up here purely just because I can. The fact that you seem to be so fascinated by me and my project is a real compliment.

The fact that you think mopar is “the biggest” way to gain players is proof enough that you don’t know what the hell you are talking about.

To all the non trolls, JustPK will be back in a few days :D[/quote]

I’m not fascinated by you, I’m “drawn in” by the fact you post on forums that you hate hoping to get people and show your hate through your posts. If you could be more “adult” like and not put the community down that u advertise on, you may see more people than the 10-20 you will get when you come back up.

Going from easyrsc to a New source that isnt “easy” takes you a week? look at a guide to set up a server, you can get one up in a day. I have released some guides in-case you need help https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,665482.0.html

theres some tools/guides i re-uploaded from awhile ago that will help you get you on your way.

Read full topic

This is why rsc is dying, people like you who put up a server, bash the community and then take it down. Trust is a big part in running a server yet the more you talk, the more you show who you really are.

you’re not gonna win against trolls yet you keep trying.[/quote]

I have nothing to prove, mopar is shit most of the people here are downy twats like you. I’ll still throw an advert up here purely just because I can. The fact that you seem to be so fascinated by me and my project is a real compliment.

The fact that you think mopar is “the biggest” way to gain players is proof enough that you don’t know what the hell you are talking about.

To all the non trolls, JustPK will be back in a few days

Their going to his server because he’s the only one who has proven to keep a server up and not die in first 3 months.
